comment: Pretty sure Joe Biden does NOT want to pick a Republican VP . He said he couldn't even think of one . Meanwhile , there are DOZENS of great DEM candidates he could ( and would ) pick if he were the nominee . Relax , folks . It ain't happening .

            :degree (p6 / pretty))
      :snt2 (s2 / say-01
